item.title: Task Configuration at Scale
item.description: A talk I did for the Automationeer’s Assemble series on how Mozilla handles complexity in their CI configuration.

item.title: Taskgraph Like a Pro
item.description: Have you ever needed to inspect the taskgraph locally? Did you have a bad time? Learn how to inspect the taskgraph like a PRO. For the impatient skip to the installation instructions below.
